trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Manipula os elementos XML usados para configurar a serialização pelo <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) group, which contains the [<dataContractSerializer>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) element, specifically, to allow the addition of types to the collection of known types.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada para manipular o [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) grupo, que contém o [ <dataContractSerializer> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/datacontractserializer-element.md) elemento Especificamente, para permitir a adição de tipos para a coleção de tipos conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about data contract known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre tipos conhecidos de contrato de dados, consulte [tipos conhecidos de contrato de dados](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the element to add to the known types collection, see [<declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como usar o elemento para adicionar à coleção de tipos conhecidos, consulte [ <declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> used to set up the known types collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> usado para configurar a coleção de tipos conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> used for the serialization configuration section.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.DataContractSerializerSection" /> usado para a seção de configuração de serialização.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> that represents the configuration to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Configuration" /> que representa a configuração a ser recuperada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the serialization configuration section for the specified configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a seção de configuração de serialização para a configuração especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> that represents the configuration section.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.SerializationSectionGroup" /> que representa a seção de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection" /> used to set up the known types collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.NetDataContractSerializerSection" /> usado para configurar a coleção de tipos conhecidos.
